title: Wonderful, rarely available 2 bedroom 2 bath, in Great Newton Location
posting_body: Stephen Foley | Foley and Soule Associates |
Rarely available 2 bed 2 bath in West Newton
Updated, modern 2 bedroom and 2 bath, plus small office, in Auburndale.
Newer kitchen (granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, and modern baths.
Easy access to shopping, employment, and recreation.
All supporting services are within proximity.
****Pictures utilized are from a similar unit in the building.
All property information has been gathered from third parties.
Foley & Soule Associates and all of its brokers and real estate agents make no representations as to the potential or current use of the property.

Pictures in advertisements may be of a similar apartment or from a prior year.
The apartment advertised may no longer be available for rental.

Accordingly, listings are subject to errors and omissions, and pricing is subject to change without notice.
